title: 70+ Trump Appointees with $193M in Crypto Assets: Administrative Capture
description: Map the systematic cryptocurrency conflicts of interest across Trump administration appointees, showing how crypto holdings create policy incentives that benefit personal financial interests over public policy.
research_areas: Which specific appointees hold the largest cryptocurrency positions?
How do their crypto holdings correlate with their regulatory responsibilities?
What policy decisions have directly benefited cryptocurrency markets?
How were these crypto positions acquired - before or after appointments?
Which agencies show the highest concentration of crypto-conflicted appointees?
source_requirements: Financial disclosure forms, crypto transaction records, policy decision timelines, regulatory impact analyses
pdf_source: The Capture Cascade - Part 5_ The Breakthrough.pdf
